channel.title: Multi attack zone? [Pi]
channel.description:
Hey, i need help making an multi attack zone?... i saw many tutorials but it doesnt explain what the coords, number, format is... any help?
Ex: public boolean inMulti() { if((absX >= 3136 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3519 && absY <= 3607) || (absX >= 3190 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3648 && absY <= 3839) || (absX >= 3200 && absX <= 3390 && absY >= 3840 && absY <= 3967) ||
can anyone explain the format for me?...

item.title: Multi attack zone? [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

First one is south west, second one is north east third one is north west. Last one is south east.

Read full topic
